name: Exposing Political and Corporate Puppetry
description: Unraveling how elected officials, CEOs, and policymakers serve as front figures for hidden elite power structures.

cards.title: Manufacturing Consent: Puppet Leaders and Fake Democracy
cards.description: Examining how political figures are carefully selected and controlled.
bulletpoints: Understanding the role of controlled opposition in political landscapes.
Tracing campaign funding to elite families and corporate donors.
Recognizing political narratives that serve globalist agendas.

cards.title: Corporate Oligarchy: The True Rulers of Government
cards.description: Analyzing how multinational corporations dictate government policies.
bulletpoints: Investigating corporate lobbying and its effect on legislation.
Exposing the ‘revolving door’ between corporate executives and government officials.
Identifying industries that profit from endless war, disease, and crisis.

cards.title: Think Tanks and Policy Steering Groups
cards.description: Examining the role of elite think tanks in shaping global governance.
bulletpoints: Tracking policy recommendations from groups like CFR, Trilateral Commission, and Bilderberg.
Understanding how NGOs and philanthropic organizations act as soft power tools.
Mapping connections between intelligence agencies and private policy institutions.
